task: Develop a basic 'Sonic the Hedgehog' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'What mistakes did you make last time?'.
name: Sonic: Time Warp Chase

branding_data.short_description: Join Sonic on a thrilling journey through time to correct past mistakes and save the world.
branding_data.detailed_description: Sonic: Time Warp Chase takes players on an exhilarating adventure across different eras as Sonic the Hedgehog strives to correct the mistakes of his past. In this unique twist on the classic platformer, Sonic must navigate through time-bending levels, each reflecting a different period in his storied history. Players will experience iconic zones reimagined with new challenges and obstacles that require quick reflexes and strategic thinking. By learning from past errors, Sonic must prevent a catastrophic future and restore the timeline. The game features stunning retro-inspired graphics, a dynamic soundtrack, and an engaging storyline that emphasizes growth and redemption.
